name: Bean Simulator (RJVB09)
description:
Bean simulator is an epic shitpost memer game. you can play as a bean, dr kleiner from half life or obamium and more. Bean simulator has several achievements and gamemodes with another one coming in the future.

”这是一个非常好游戏“ ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

- BAI DU 百度 （very official）

have fun playing this shitpost of a game
